about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

Officer graphics for Lu Bu (RTK VI) and Sima Yi (RTK VII) will be added. These officers were selected by fans from among previous titles.

▼Added Officers Graphics
Lu Bu/Sima Yi

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the applicable officers listed above. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special tab. Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
